Html:
Hi everyone!

I read the licensing section. After reading it, I understand why I am not a lawyer :)

In summary, I created a web application that may use PHPExcel as a reporting option.

I would like to know if I am allowed to sell my web application including PHPExcel with his licensing?

Thank you very much,
Have a nice day|
Sébastien

Sébastien D'Errico
Web Development Consultant
sebastien@hollox.net
(438) 882-8687

Hello Sébastien,

That would be no problem: LGPL allows you tu use libraries like PHPExcel in closed-source projects.

Best regards,

Maarten

Thank you very much Maarten for this confirmation!!

Sébastien
